channel.title: Ports are opened but server offline? HELP? :/
channel.description:
Hello, i have oroblem i did all stuff and i have opene ports but i have only opened UDP i dont know why TCP isnt opened but i have did all in client gui.java and in source stuff changed ip and stuff but server is still offline can some one help me? I GOT TEAMVIEWER TOO : )
Add me to msn viku12@hot.ee
Sory about my english im from Estonia :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 06:27:43 am[/size][hr]Bump... please people? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 08:18:54 am[/size][hr]hello...=(

item.title: Ports are opened but server offline? HELP? :/
item.dc:creator: @vinku12 vinku12
item.description:
@vinku12 wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:4, topic:317967”]have u portforwarded?
have you a no-ip account?
have you the download thing from no-ip thing?
do you have the no-ip thing running and have the port opened? and then put the ip in the client?[/quote] Yes i did all that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 12:06:51 pm[/size][hr]Bump… hello =(

Read full topic

item.title: Ports are opened but server offline? HELP? :/
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

have u portforwarded?
have you a no-ip account?
have you the download thing from no-ip thing?
do you have the no-ip thing running and have the port opened? and then put the ip in the client?

item.title: Ports are opened but server offline? HELP? :/
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Try to open a TCP port. Do you have the runserver.bat edited to your needs? Like with the CLASSPATHS and stuff? Next try to open up the options on your No-IP DUC and check off the ones that apply to you.

Read full topic
